frontmatter.title: Integration Test Creation utililzing the ADOT Test Framework
frontmatter.description: This blog post provides a walk-through of the ADOT test framework and provides an example for adding an integrated test case using the framework. In order to add new components to ADOT collector, it is required to include end-to-end integrated test cases. This blog post will discuss how and why this framework helps contributors add test case into ADOT Collector.

headings.value: Run ADOT test framework for AWS platform usage
